# Resuming Quarto kernel troubleshootings

After yesterday's failure, I set up a virtual environment inside my blog project folder, as recommended in the Debian documentation for Python library modules. This is the code I run:

```
mkdir -p ./.venvs

# Creating a folder inside a virtual environment
python3 -m venv ./.venvs/jupyter 

# Installing the Python package there
./.venvs/jupyter/bin/python -m pip install jupyter

quarto check jupyter
```

I'll try again tomorrow following this [tutorial on how to set up Quarto virtual environments](https://quarto.org/docs/projects/virtual-environments.html).
